title: Actress Norma Shearer’s 1930 Oscar sold at auction for $180,000
text:
Published By: Reuters - Entertainment - Today 
LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - An Oscar statuette awarded to actress Norma Shearer in 1930 sold on Wednesday for $180,000 in a rare sale of an Acad...
